Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

behavior find_and_use_knife(knife:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(knife)
        # Temporarily hold the knife Youll put it down once the task is done

behavior slice_chicken(chicken:item, knife:item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken)
        # Slice the chicken using the knife

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken
        find_knife()
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select the knife
        find_and_use_knife(knife) # Find and use the knife
        slice_chicken(chicken, knife) # Slice the chicken

behavior slice_chicken(chicken:item, knife:item):

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Slice the chicken.', '2. Give the sliced chicken to the cat.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken item

        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board) and surfaces(cutting_board)
        # Select the cutting board that is suitable for cutting the chicken

        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select the knife to be used for slicing the chicken

        observe(chicken, "Place chicken on the cutting board")
        # Ensure the chicken is placed on the cutting board

        observe(cutting_board,"Check if chicken is on the cutting board")
        # Make sure the chicken is on the cutting board

        achieve close_char(char, cutting_board)
        # Approach the cutting board to start slicing

        achieve cut(chicken)
        # Slice the chicken

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Slice the chicken.', '2. Give the sliced chicken to your cat.']

behavior slice_the_chicken(chicken:item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and cuttable(chicken)
        slice_the_chicken(chicken)
